languages.text: {n}Усталость исчертила ее лицо морщинами, нервный тик бьет щеку, но в глазах пылает неукротимый огонь. Ее словно окутывает сияющая аура власти и праведного гнева. Изящным движением приложив к губам изукрашенный золотом ингалятор, Инцендия делает глубокий вдох, и пламя во взгляде вспыхивает плазменной турбиной.{/n}

{n}Exhaustion has marked Incendia's features with a criss-cross of lines and deeper furrows. Her cheek is forever twisted in a continuous nervous tic, yet her eyes are ablaze with indomitable resolve. A dazzling aura of power and righteous fury surrounds her like a mantle. She gracefully brings a gold-plated inhaler to her lips, takes a deep breath, and the fire in her gaze flares like a plasma thruster.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Усталость исчертила ее лицо морщинами, нервный тик бьет щеку, но в глазах пылает неукротимый огонь. Ее словно окутывает сияющая аура власти и праведного гнева. Изящным движением приложив к губам изукрашенный золотом ингалятор, Инцендия делает глубокий вдох, и пламя во взгляде вспыхивает плазменной турбиной.{/n}

languages.text: {n}因森蒂娅脸上满是疲惫之意，脸上的皱纹变得更深了。她的由于持续不断地紧张抽搐而变得扭曲，但目光中却闪烁着不屈不挠的决心，整个人都散发着强大的气场与正义的愤怒。她以优雅的动作，将一个镀金的呼吸器放在嘴边，深吸一口气，目光中的烈焰就像等离子推进器一样熊熊燃烧。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Exhaustion has marked Incendia's features with a criss-cross of lines and deeper furrows. Her cheek is forever twisted in a continuous nervous tic, yet her eyes are ablaze with indomitable resolve. A dazzling aura of power and righteous fury surrounds her like a mantle. She gracefully brings a gold-plated inhaler to her lips, takes a deep breath, and the fire in her gaze flares like a plasma thruster.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}因森蒂娅脸上充满了疲惫之意，脸颊也由于一刻不停的紧张抽搐变得扭曲，但她的目光中却闪烁着不屈不挠的决心，整个人身上散发着强大的气场与正义的愤怒。她以优雅的动作，将一个镀金的呼吸器放在嘴边，深吸一口气，目光中的烈焰就像等离子推进器一样熊熊燃烧。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}疲労困憊したインセンディアの顔には、十字のシワと深い溝が刻まれている。頬は常にピクピクと神経質に動いているが、瞳は固い決意で燃えている。権力と正義の怒りのオーラがマントのように彼女を包み込んでいた。優雅に金のコーティングがされた吸入具を口に運んで深く息を吸うと、瞳の炎がプラズマ・スラスターのように輝き始めた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Exhaustion has marked Incendia's features with a criss-cross of lines and deeper furrows. Her cheek is forever twisted in a continuous nervous tic, yet her eyes are ablaze with indomitable resolve. A dazzling aura of power and righteous fury surrounds her like a mantle. She gracefully brings a gold-plated inhaler to her lips, takes a deep breath, and the fire in her gaze flares like a plasma thruster.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}疲労困憊したインセンディアの顔には、十字のシワと深い溝が刻まれている。頬は常にピクピクと神経質に動いているが、瞳は固い決意で燃えている。権力と正義の怒りのオーラがマントのように彼女を包み込んでいた。優雅に金のコーティングがされた吸入具を口に運んで深く息を吸うと、瞳の炎がプラズマ・スラスターのように輝き始めた。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}El cansancio ha marcado las facciones de Incendia con líneas entrecruzadas y surcos profundos. Su mejilla se retuerce en un tic nervioso continuo, pero sus ojos brillan con una determinación indomable. Un aura brillante de poder y de ira la envuelve como un manto. Se lleva con elegancia un inhalador chapado en oro a los labios, respira hondo y el fuego de su mirada se enciende como un propulsor de plasma.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Exhaustion has marked Incendia's features with a criss-cross of lines and deeper furrows. Her cheek is forever twisted in a continuous nervous tic, yet her eyes are ablaze with indomitable resolve. A dazzling aura of power and righteous fury surrounds her like a mantle. She gracefully brings a gold-plated inhaler to her lips, takes a deep breath, and the fire in her gaze flares like a plasma thruster.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El cansancio ha dibujado arrugas en el rostro de Incendia, su mejilla se retuerce en un tic nervioso continuo, pero sus ojos brillan con una determinación indomable. Un aura brillante de poder y de ira la envuelve como un manto. Se lleva con elegancia un inhalador chapado en oro a los labios, respira hondo y el fuego de su mirada se enciende como un propulsor de plasma.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Die Erschöpfung hat ein Netz aus Linien und Falten auf Incendias Gesichtszüge gezeichnet. In ihrer Wange haust wohl für alle Zeiten ein nervöses Zucken ... doch in ihren Augen lodert unbezwingbare Entschlossenheit. Eine strahlender Aura der Macht und des rechtschaffenen Zorns umhüllt sie ein Mantel. Elegant führt sie einen vergoldeten Inhalator an ihre Lippen und atmet tief ein. Das Feuer in ihrem Blick flammt auf wie eine Plasmadüse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Exhaustion has marked Incendia's features with a criss-cross of lines and deeper furrows. Her cheek is forever twisted in a continuous nervous tic, yet her eyes are ablaze with indomitable resolve. A dazzling aura of power and righteous fury surrounds her like a mantle. She gracefully brings a gold-plated inhaler to her lips, takes a deep breath, and the fire in her gaze flares like a plasma thruster.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Erschöpfung hat Linien auf Incendias Gesichtszüge gezeichnet und in ihrer Wange haust wohl für alle Zeiten ein nervöses Zucken ... doch in ihren Augen lodert unbezwingbare Entschlossenheit. Eine strahlender Aura der Macht und des rechtschaffenen Zorns umhüllt sie ein Mantel. Elegant führt sie einen vergoldeten Inhalator an ihre Lippen und atmet tief ein. Das Feuer in ihrem Blick flammt auf wie eine Plasmadüse.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia a les traits tirés par l'épuisement et son front est plissé. Sa joue est prise d'un tic nerveux incessant, mais son regard brûle d'une résolution infaillible. Une brillante aura de puissance et de fureur vertueuse la nimbe comme un manteau. D'un geste gracieux, elle porte un inhalateur doré à ses lèvres et prend une profonde inspiration. Les flammes dans ses yeux s'intensifient.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Exhaustion has marked Incendia's features with a criss-cross of lines and deeper furrows. Her cheek is forever twisted in a continuous nervous tic, yet her eyes are ablaze with indomitable resolve. A dazzling aura of power and righteous fury surrounds her like a mantle. She gracefully brings a gold-plated inhaler to her lips, takes a deep breath, and the fire in her gaze flares like a plasma thruster.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia a les traits tirés d'épuisement et sa joue est prise d'un tic nerveux incessant, mais son regard brûle d'une résolution infaillible. Une brillante aura de puissance et de fureur vertueuse la nimbe comme un manteau. D'un geste gracieux, elle porte un inhalateur doré à ses lèvres et prend une profonde inspiration. Les flammes dans ses yeux s'intensifient.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}İncendia'nın yüz hatları, bitkinlikten kaynaklı çapraz çizgilerle ve derinleşmiş kırışıklıklarla dolu. Yanağı daimî olarak gergin bir tikle seğirirken gözleri, yılmaz bir kararlılıkla cayır cayır yanıyor. Göz kamaştırıcı bir güç aurası ve erdemli bir öfke, onu bir örtü gibi çevreliyor. Altın kaplama bir solunum aletini zarafetle dudaklarına götürüyor, derin bir nefes çekiyor ve gözlerindeki alev, âdeta bir plazma itici gibi harlanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Exhaustion has marked Incendia's features with a criss-cross of lines and deeper furrows. Her cheek is forever twisted in a continuous nervous tic, yet her eyes are ablaze with indomitable resolve. A dazzling aura of power and righteous fury surrounds her like a mantle. She gracefully brings a gold-plated inhaler to her lips, takes a deep breath, and the fire in her gaze flares like a plasma thruster.{/n}

Altın kaplama bir solunum aletini zarafetle dudaklarına götürüyor, derin bir nefes çekiyor ve gözlerindeki alev, âdeta bir plazma itici gibi harlanıyor.{/n}
